AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was simply a child during the Red Year. Though [PAWN_possessive] memories of the event are hazy, every night [PAWN_pronoun] wakes up in a cold sweat, as [PAWN_possessive] nightmares force [PAWN_objective] to relive the horror.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind many good slaves in the process. It was a very emotional time for [PAWN_nameDef], as replacing those slaves will be hard work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind a prosperous netch ranch in the process. While simple beasts, [PAWN_nameDef] considered the netch to be [PAWN_possessive] best friends, and shed many tears while leaving Vvardenfell.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind [PAWN_possessive] job at the local egg mine. Whilst [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't miss the claustrophobic tunnels, a small part of [PAWN_objective] does miss the strange sounds the kwama made.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind [PAWN_possessive] job at the local glass mine. [PAWN_nameDef] is still annoyed that [PAWN_pronoun] was unable to steal any glass before being forced out.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind [PAWN_possessive] job at the local ebony mine. [PAWN_nameDef] tried to pocket some ebony before leaving, but severly underestimated how heavy small chunks were, and lost [PAWN_possessive] bag in the process.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind [PAWN_possessive] job as a skooma runner. In all the chaos [PAWN_nameDef] decided to finally try some skooma, hoping it would relax [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind [PAWN_possessive] highly popular corner club in Balmora. [PAWN_nameDef] often looks back fondly at [PAWN_possessive] time spent running the corner club, and imagines what life may have been like if [PAWN_pronoun] was still in Balmora.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind [PAWN_possessive] job as a gondolier in Vivec city. [PAWN_nameDef] often yearns for the simple days, peacefully rowing [PAWN_possessive] gondola between the cantons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind [PAWN_possessive] prized ash yam farm. Of course several slaves were also left behind, but [PAWN_nameDef] only cared about the ash yams.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind [PAWN_possessive] life in Ald'Ruhn. [PAWN_nameDef] still remembers that day as if it were yesterday. The sounds, sights, and smells are permanently etched into [PAWN_possessive] mind, and grow much stronger at the sight of fire.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Red Year refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of Vvardenfell during the Red Year, leaving behind [PAWN_possessive] guar ranch. While [PAWN_nameDef] may miss herding the guar, [PAWN_pronoun] certainly does not miss replacing [PAWN_possessive] boots every few days.
